data.name: Do U Copy?
data.detailed_description:
There is no better feeling than earning money through honest hard work...until you play Do U Copy? !

Do U Copy? is an asymmetrical party game for all players who want to put their communication skills to the test.

In "Do U Copy? Vol.1 : it’s (not) payday" - play as the Thief and make your way through one of the (least) secured banks in the country. Avoid traps, guards and camera using your VR legs and the guidance of your « guy-in-the-chair ».

OR

Play as the Hacker, become the eyes and ears of the operations through your phone, tablet or laptop! Using your (un)realistic skills, hack through the bank securities, guide your ally and solve engaging puzzles with unexpected turns!

As the Thief, your goal is to safely make your way to the bank vault while sneaking behind every guard, traps and cameras. Run through the bank using your virtual legs and quick thinking while helping your Hacker solving (almost) unbreakable puzzles. Communication will be key in this intense robbery!

As the Hacker, you're the eyes and ears of this operation. Infiltrate the bank’s security network to guide your partner to the safe. Access the bank’s floor plan, observe the guards and solve the riddles to help your thief succeed in his mission.

Each puzzle solutions are randomly generated at every restart so you’ll never make the same run twice !

You can play Do U Copy? how you want it (remotely and local) ! Have a Quest and an Android device ? No problem! Wanna switch with an Index ? You can !

Do U Copy? will be available upon release on Oculus Quest/Rift – VIVE – Index and all compatible SteamVR platforms (Thief) along iOS/Android & Windows (Hacker).

Do U Copy? requires a minimum of 2 players to be played. Get the Hacker App directly on our website.

data.short_description: Do U Copy? is a VR asymmetrical party game immersing you into a bank heist scenario in cooperation. Play as the Thief or the Hacker to achieve your mission.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 or Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i7 or Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

subs.option_text: Do U Copy? Private Beta - VR - 209₴
